ARABIC: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا وَعْدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقًّا وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: to remain in them timelessly, for ever. Allah's promise is true. He is the Almighty, the All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They will abide in them for ever. The promise of God is true; and He is all-mighty and all-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They shall abide in them forever. This is Allah's promise that shall come true. He is the Most Powerful, the Most Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: wherein they will live forever. It is the true promise of God. He is Majestic and All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In which they will abide; it is a true promise of Allah; and only He is the Almighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: To abide therein. It is a promise of Allah in truth. And He is the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Abiding in them; the promise of Allah; (a) true (promise), and He is the Mighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: therein to dwell forever -- God's promise in truth; and He is the All-mighty, the All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Wherein they will abide. It is a promise of Allah in truth. He is the Mighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: wherein they will abide forever. That is God's true promise; He is the Mighty, the Wise One.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Therein they will be abiders: a true promise of Allah. And He is the Mighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: to remain in them [forever]—a true promise of Allah, and He is the All-mighty, the All-wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: To dwell therein. The promise of Allah is true: and He is Exalted in Power, Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: To abide therein. It is a Promise of Allah in truth. And He is the All-Mighty, the All-Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: where they shall live for ever. The promise of Allah is the truth; He is the Almighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Dwelling therein forever. The promise of God is true. He is the Mighty, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Wherein they abide eternally; [it is] the promise of Allah [which is] truth. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [31:9] abiding therein (khālidīna fīhā, is a circumstantial qualification [of a future status]), in other words, their abiding therein will have been ordained once they enter it — a promise of God in truth, that is to say, God promised them this and realised it in truth; and He is the Mighty, Whom nothing can overwhelm and so prevent Him from fulfilling His promise and His threat [of chastisement], the Wise, the One Who assigns all things to their rightful places.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Wherein they will abide) for eternity, never to die or leave it. (It is a promise of Allah) to the believers (in truth) truly. (He is the Mighty) in His kingdom and dominion, (the Wise) in His command and decree.
